messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cwaptain has joined the fuwwy side. He is in the bawr...

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, not more than 15 squeaking things have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cwaptain went chatatonic, I am your nwew cwaptain, bow to me . Nya~!!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Detective's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Xenobiology Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
